original_text: But if someone speaks a clear message from God, he helps the people who hear him. He helps them to become stronger as believers. He helps them to be happy and strong in their troubles.
korean_text: 그러나 예언하는 자는 사람에게 말하여 덕을 세우며 권면하며 위로하는 것이요

sentences.original_text: But if someone speaks a clear message from God
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 만약 누군가 하나님으로부터 명확한 메시지를 말한다면

sentences.original_text: he helps the people who hear him
He helps them to become stronger as believers
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그들이 믿는 자로서 더 강해지도록 돕습니다

sentences.original_text: He helps them to be happy

sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들의 환난 속에서 강해지도록 돕습니다
